text: Alejandro Maldonado Aguirre (born January 6, 1936) is a Guatemalan politician. He was the acting President of Guatemala following the Congress of Guatemala's acceptance of the resignation of Otto PÃ©rez Molina on September 3, 2015. He left office on January 14, 2016. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Guatemala
